name: 江雅綺
objective: This course provides students a general understanding on human rights issues in the modern society and further helps students explore the conflicts among different considerations. It begins with a brief introduction on the categories of human rights under the current Constitution and follows by the case discussion of various topics. Students will be required to participate in the class, organize a presentation project by team work and submit final reports on a selected human right issue.
